eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 11:45 PM ON OCT 24, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:30 AM OCT 29, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A Safe Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. The Mesa Police Department is looking for 23 year old Antonio Ayala.  Antonio is a Native American male, 5 feet 7 inches tall, 220 pounds, with brown eyes and black hair.  Antonio was last seen at 1635 hours on 10/24/25 on foot near Main Street and Power Road.  He is believed to be wearing a red t-shirt and black jeans.  Antonio suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become disoriented or easily confused.  If you have seen Antonio, please contact the Mesa Police Department at 480 644 2211 or call 911. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
